experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implemented data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore, improving database efficiency and data lifecycle management.
reference_context: Skills: Python, Docker, MongoDB, Git, AWS (ECR, Cloudwatch, Inspector)
experiences.reasoning: This role involved optimizing data processing and system scalability, emphasizing skills in software development and DevOps.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in Production environments for 2 international financial banking firms. Engineered 6 GUI-based workflow runs for ETL pipelines and integrated them with backend scripts to process data. Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment module by customizing UI Forms and PL/SQL scripts. Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation, reducing execution times by 20% while generating end-user reports. Documented technical designs and deployed code packages via WinSCP/PuTTY client-server apps.
reference_context: Skills: PL/SQL, XML, Oracle DB, Oracle OFSAA, ETL
experiences.reasoning: Handled full-stack development for banking solutions, focusing on fintech systems and database management.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern - Python Developer, DevOps Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline in a distributed system for transforming raw data to inferred values with end-to-end automated testing. Optimized scaling and performance. Diagnosed and fixed model build pipeline failures using Cloudwatch logs. Automated deployment processes with CI/CD workflows using GitHub Actions.
reference_context: Role similar to the previous position at NREL as a Software Development Engineer
experiences.reasoning: This internship focused on enhancing data processing efficiency and scalability with a significant emphasis on debugging and automation.
